sentences.sContent: Luke made an obscene gesture with his finger.
sentences.sCn: 卢克用手指做了一个下流的手势。

sentences.sContent: ...but for them the gesture means goodbye or go away...
...Speakers of English have a similar gesture though the hand may not be cupped and the fingers may be held more loosely...

phrases.pCn: 做手势，表示；做一个手势

words.tran: 用姿势示意；（讲话时）做手势
用手势谈话；做姿势表达

trans.tranOther: a movement of part of your body, especially your hands or head, to show what you mean or how you feel
